sentences: The tall stone _____ pointed towards the sky in ancient Egypt.

_____ was the falcon-headed god of the sky.

_____ was one of Egypt's most important deities.
_____ was the god of the afterlife and resurrection.
_____ ruled over the realm of the dead.
The myth of _____ was central to Egyptian beliefs about death.

The _____ learned combat skills and chivalric code.
